query:
-- Criar paciente Miguel vinculado ao Lúcio
INSERT INTO patients (name, diagnosis, familyUserId, createdAt)
VALUES ('Miguel Santos Silva', 'TEA Nível 1', 
  (SELECT id FROM users WHERE email = 'lucio@example.com'), NOW());

-- Criar 3 agendamentos para Miguel
INSERT INTO appointments (patientId, therapistId, therapyType, scheduledAt, status, createdAt)
SELECT 
  (SELECT id FROM patients WHERE name = 'Miguel Santos Silva' AND familyUserId = (SELECT id FROM users WHERE email = 'lucio@example.com')),
  (SELECT id FROM users WHERE email = 'lucas@example.com'),
  'Psicologia',
  DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) + INTERVAL 9 HOUR,
  'scheduled',
  NOW()
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  (SELECT id FROM patients WHERE name = 'Miguel Santos Silva' AND familyUserId = (SELECT id FROM users WHERE email = 'lucio@example.com')),
  (SELECT id FROM users WHERE email = 'lucas@example.com'),
  'Fonoaudiologia',
  DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 DAY) + INTERVAL 10 HOUR,
  'scheduled',
  NOW()
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  (SELECT id FROM patients WHERE name = 'Miguel Santos Silva' AND familyUserId = (SELECT id FROM users WHERE email = 'lucio@example.com')),
  (SELECT id FROM users WHERE email = 'lucas@example.com'),
  'Terapia Ocupacional',
  DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 5 DAY) + INTERVAL 14 HOUR,
  'scheduled',
  NOW();

SELECT 'Dados criados com sucesso!' as status;
